website_summaries.verdict: A stunning matte lipstick that's comparable in quality to higher-end brands.
pros: Lipstick dries to a beautiful smudge-resistant matte finish
Creamy formula glides on, never looking dry or cracked
Stays on all day with minimal touch ups after meals
Available in a wide range of unique shades
cons: Hard to tell the exact shade from photos, it's best to look up swatches of the color you want

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Received sooner than expected. Love the color. I read online it was a nice dupe to a more expensive lipstick I adore. It dries matte and stays on. These pictures are after I've worn it for a couple hours and even drank coffee. I ordered mine in the shade "Euro-trash".
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: LOOK UP SWATCHES BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: Look up a swatch of the shade you're looking at online before you buy it, the pictures here are not even close to the shade you're getting. I knew about this and ordered the shade I wanted and got that exact shade, I just wanted to make sure anyone reading reviews knows that the pictures on here are literally many, MANY shades away from what you're purchasing. Whipped Caviar is a gorgeous shade, definitely one of my favorite from NYX, I'm just saying the image shown for it is not accurate whatsoever. It is, however, a gorgeous color. Goes on a smooth matte and stays in place. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Octane

customer_reviews.title: Pure red.
customer_reviews.text: Great dupe for “lady danger” by Mac. I you have olive skin tone and or medium skin or tan. Red orange will look more red. It will brighten up your face. No need to get all dolled up. Matte and clean. I forgot to exfoliate my lips and apply chapstick (I in particular have super dry lips. Genetics :/).
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Tigress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lip sticks I ever bought in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: The greatest lip color I've ever had. Goes on smooth and sets matte. Lasts for hours and never smudges.
customer_reviews.author: cmg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Maison is my favorite NYX Matte Lipstick color I get many compliments when I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: angelica zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I brought the color gold digger love it so far! It feels great on my lips even though it's matte it doesn't feel dry on my lips and doesn't crack my lips at all. I use lip liner to bring it out more does have moisture applies on smoothly. I love that NYX products are animal cruelty free..
customer_reviews.author: Dee Vera

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shade of red for dark skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this color. I am always super self conscious when I'm buying matte lipsticks, but wow this one is totally worth even more than the price. It just became my favorite lipcolor even though a few days ago I would not have even dreamed of wearing red lipcolor.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: I never wear lipstick, these are a good experimental start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick in Angel (right) and Bloody Mary (left) because I didn't really have any lipstick and wanted to try something new. Pros: colors are lovely, no annoying shine, can be rubbed away a little to give a more 'natural' look. Cons: too vibrant for me right at application, but when I rub it off a bit it yields a look that works for me. Case is cheaply made but doesn't interfere with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Goodjuju

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS RED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a red lipstick for a show and I HATE red lipstick in general. This Perfect Red is a miracle. I have dark hair and fair skin and "older" skin and it still looks lovely. It did not bleed nor move during 2 hours of singing, dancing and sweating. LOVE THIS LIPSTICK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Caviar: GREAT color!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT color for fair skin! A true matte finish. A+ for being lightweight! The only downsides are it's not very creamy so it's a little hard to apply and the tube doesn't have much product in it. But the color and weightlessness make up for it. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color, extreme transfer
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting more into bold lipstick colors so I gave this one a shot because it was a cheaper option. I love the color and it goes on well. The only problem is that it smears so much and transfers onto everything with the slightest touch. Good for wearing for a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match advertised color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc of the picture in the advertisement for ‘Butter’ but upon receiving it, the color looks nothing like the advertised ‘butter’ color. It is advertised as more of a taupe nude and the one I received is a brown red. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick goes really good with M.A.C. Current lip pencil. It feels good on, and doesn't dry your lips out. I forgot I had lipstick on at one point. I will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia Salone

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than photo...
customer_reviews.text: I have used nude shades of Mac lipstick for a while so I was excited when I read a review saying this was comparable. I ordered the "pale pink" which I thought should look like the photo. This lipstick is much darker, If you want a "pale" color I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Love the shade, not the formula.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shades. I got perfect red and whipped caviar. They are amongst my favorite from any line. However, I’m not the biggest fan of the formula. It is very dry. You have to push pretty hard to get it to spread evenly. It’s not moisturizing at all. I wish the formula was better because these shades are everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amber mattox

customer_reviews.title: Purple undertones in “Honeymoon”
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the shade “Honeymoon”. The two star rating is because the color itself is not as accurate as the image. The shade has a purple undertone that made me look like a dead body. A friend of mine called it zombie lips lol! Please note that I’m in no way discrediting Nyx quality. Quality of the item was 5/5. Just the Honeymoon color was not a fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea K.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting matte lipstick - Siren
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! It stays on and moisturizes my lips, but I'm ordering in a different color. Siren is beautiful but just a bit too purple for me.
customer_reviews.author: smsmoot

customer_reviews.title: Love The Color!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a darker color with brown under tones and this shade fits that need. However, I was hoping it wouldn't be as dry as it is... it has a hard drag while applying (even after using a little Moringa oil first). But it doesn't crack or parch my lips and feels light enough once it's on. It's been on for 5 hours through smoking, vaping and drinking from a glass.. still looks the same as when I applied it. I'm enjoying the color but honestly don't think I would purchase this brand again because it doesn't have the velvety feel or look that I'm seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Keyanna Otholt

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this lipstick at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on all the great reviews, and frankly feel like how could someone seriously like this color? It's neither "natural" nor does it go on smoothly. It has an unattractive orangey pink undertone that is very unnatural. It drags on the lips when being applied. It's being tossed out. Very disappointed in the product and the reviews touting this as a great lipstick. And yes, mine was clearly labeled as Natural--otherwise I'd think I received a different product. Will likely never buy another NYX lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: PNW

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice bright red
customer_reviews.text: I normally shy away from RED reds due to my skin tone (fair/blonde) but decided to give it a try. I was pleasantly surprised that it was so nice on me! Now, with this formula, there’s not a lot of room for “oops”, so if you’re a klutz with lipstick like me this is not a good option for throw in your purse and reapply on the fly. But I was impressed with both the color AND the fact it didn’t bleed off on everything I touched! Will be trying other shades in this formula, but this will be a nice red for when I want something brighter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: It's fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first matte lipstick, and I couldn't be happier. It is a great color and stays on for hours even with my lips touching the microphone. I find it really doesn't even need to be applied every set. I walk in to the restroom thinking I'm needing more lipstick, look in the mirror and it's still perfect! It's like that scene in Happy Days where Fonzie walks into the restroom to comb his hair, looks in the mirror and says, "Heeeeey!" like nothing needed here. It's fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Kate and Doug Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: ARIA is LIGHTER than pictured!
customer_reviews.text: The aria color is a much lighter purple than what is pictured so make sure that you're aware of this before buying! I was looking for a deep purple shade, and that is not what this is. If it is layered multiple times over a dark red, it ends up being the right shade (mostly), but it's a lot of work to get it there. If, between every layer, you use the powder through tissue method and then after it's all done spray with NYX finishing spray, it lasts for awhile but there's still quite a bit of transfer. Layer up, ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Grace L

customer_reviews.title: Good lipstick, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like Nyx’s matte lipsticks as they have the look and longevity I’m going for. The lipstick I’m wearing in my picture is Dark Era. However, the lipstick tube is less than great.
customer_reviews.author: lbud

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this lip stick at Ricky's in NYC. Ricky's was a costume store and alot of show girls and guys used to shop there. For some reason all lip stick turns orange on me. Regardless of what color it is. This is one of the few lip sticks that does not turn orange on me. Ricky's closed. So I started to buy super expensive lip stick at Sephora that was hit or miss. Most of them turned orange and I spent a fortune in lip stick. But me and my hubby are out of work now so I was happy to find this on Amazon! Don't hesitate to buy it! The colors are as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Lew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red, perfect lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect red is the best name for this lipstick because thats what it is, perfect! The shade is so complimentary to my skintone and leaves my lips looking gorgeous. Its a true, bright red with a ton of pigment. I had no issues with bleeding or excessive transfer. It looks awesome both matte, and with a gloss on top. If you want undeniably bombshell lips, you have to get Perfect Red by Nyx. For a budget friendly lipstick, this one is pure luxury!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Best Red Lipstick Ever
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this! Very flattering for all skin tone/colour, I know cus I got these for all my colleagues (black, white, Asian, Latin) and it literally looks good on everyone. It can be a bit difficult to apply so I use a brush, which helps a lot. It is indeed matte but to my surprise, not drying. It does transfer quite a bit when you're drinking or eating but I guess that's why it isn't so drying on the lips. And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Manee

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting but..
customer_reviews.text: There’s In option to color match either someone close to your skin tone or take a photo of yourself to find the best color for yourself... this never works. I color matched hoping for a nude that won’t look crazy on me (I’m medium brown) and when I actually got it... just didn’t work out. I always have to add another color with it to get the color I want.
customer_reviews.author: Benzo

customer_reviews.title: Package left in a strange location
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the person who delivered the package. I cannot bend over well, so I have a bench by my front door - and even have a note to put packages on the bench. He walked up to about 5' from the bench and laid it down on the driveway. It was hard for me to pick up & I thought it was a strange place to put the package.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Color In Photo Is Off - Still Like The Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand before; that’s why I ordered this. I’m still in search of a matte true nude lipstick for my lips + skin tone. The moment I opened this “Nude” shade, I knew it wouldn’t work. The color was more of a medium tone muted brick orange. Amazon is being helpful with resolving this, but I thought you should be aware the picture is much lighter and more neutral tan looking than the actual lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Jencmar

customer_reviews.title: pillowtalk, schmillowtalkkkk
customer_reviews.text: 100% dupe fer CT pillowtalk imho. perfect match to nyx peekaboo nude lipliner. super flattering to my goth winter complexion n also while tan during summer months. the perfect everyday lip color n stays put under ur mask. <3 its matte so its alittle dry but not overly n applies nicely straight from the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: The lipstick color shown is not even close to what u get. Way darker. Not a great feel either. They should take a actual pic
customer_reviews.text: I received my lipstick today and was lil worried it's going to b too light! The pic is very very light..but that would b ok, I wanted a natural very light pink to wear. I c it on women a lot and like it but have yet to find one. It's always too dark, and this one is the same. Way way darker then the picture of the color. It's a bright hot pink looking color. Goes on a lil lighter then it looks but disappointed. The feel isn't the best either feels dry, I'm a lipstick feen and I have bought many brands and colors this one is off my list..
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not my shade unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on this morning to wear to work and its just not my color. I love their lipstick and makeup. The quality is good and it stays on for a long time but I have to pass on this one. I have light / fair skin with cool skin tone so I thought it would look good but its too out there for me. Would maybe look better on darker skin tone. I still recommend their products though!
customer_reviews.author: K38

customer_reviews.title: I would order again and in more colors.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the colors Butter, Honeymoon, siren. and Alabama. Butter is darker than the picture but it’s still a pretty color. Alabama is more of a darker red. It’s sort of a wine color but it’s so pretty. Honeymoon is my least favorite. It’s kind of a dullish nude and would look better with lip liner. Siren is darker that what I expected and doesn’t look good on me. The lipsticks are matte but they don’t last long. If you don’t have a problem with having to reapply then you should order.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany b.

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't expecting much at 3 bucks, but my expectations were exceeded by far. Firstly, this is a true bright RED, not pink or orange or too dark. It is also long wear and stays put. This will be my new go to red for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chezby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Universal Shade (Alabama)
customer_reviews.text: A very beautiful universal color. It goes on super smoothly, and is NOT tacky when your lips press together. It felt light when I put it on. The color is pigmented so it doesn’t take a heavy hand to apply, but do be cautioned that it might stain the surrounding skin when you go to wipe off the lipstick (not bad, it left a light tint around my lips, that a make up remover wipe did get off after a light scrubbing).
customer_reviews.author: Ashton L.

customer_reviews.title: I had to toss it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this lipstick. It's a beautiful shade but the product is just bad. I applied in the early morning and by lunch it had come off but the stain had left my lips looking horrible. If I hadn't went in to check myself and went through the day I would have been very embarrassed to be seen. After wiping it off with sandpaper (that's how hard you have to wipe to get it all off!) I just opted for some chap stick. Made me super sad I couldn't love this.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna V.

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous deep, pure berry-purple. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous deep, pure berry-purple. I use it to add a cooler tone to Ruby Woo (which is too warm-red for my skin despite the fact that they describe it as blue-red). I prefer lipstick colors without any hint of brown or white to muddy or gray it down - and this MLS30 Aria is PURE and un-muddy nor adulterated with brown or white. Plus being mat it stays on without getting on the teeth or around the outside of the lips.
customer_reviews.author: The Julia ListTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Angel not as pictured - Bloody Mary is great!
customer_reviews.text: The Angel shade looks light pink in the photo, but it's a brighter magenta-y pink. It's a nice color, just don't assume it looks anything like the photo - do a google image search for the true shade. Bloody Mary is a fantastic bright red with pink tones that is the perfect summer red. I wish the texture of the lipstick was a little more creamy, it drags a bit upon application, but it feels nice when on.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick does NOT glide on, it's rather dry which should be a good thing for longer-lasting lipstick. Meh. It doesn't last that long. The color is good but I think I've learned my lesson that only if you've seen the color in person and know exactly what you are getting, should you buy online. Lipstick, like shoes, should be bought in person. I probably would have passed on this color. I do like the price. The price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: THE WRONG COLOR OF LIPSTICK TOO DARK
customer_reviews.text: I WAS EXPECTING NICE PINK COLOR, BUT I DID RECIEVE THE TOTALLY DIFFERENT COLOR, ITS MUCH MUCH DARKER FOR MY Y TASTE, AND I AM IN 70-S CANNOT DO THIS DARK, I JUST RECIEVED IT --THE UPPER PART -SAYS: MAT ROUGE A LEVRES, I ASSUMED --IT S A COLOR OF PICTURED ON THE LISTING PAGE, THE BOTTOM SAYS-ML$15 WHIPPED CAVIAR, WHICH MATCHES THE LISTED TITLE. I CANNOT USE IT--IT LOOKS DARK BROWN.--I DID NOT TRY IT , AND I AM NOT GOING TO USE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Fish

customer_reviews.title: very matte but long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It makes your lips feel dry but the color is rich and it stays on for a long time. I have had some problems with feathering but not enough to make me stop wearing it. I always get lots of compliments when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Best matte lip for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this matte lip color- and for the price on amazon you should buy it in several colors! It is comparable to some of the expensive name brand lip colors for a fraction of the price! It is truly a matte lip and it stays without needing to be reapplied!
customer_reviews.author: ori

customer_reviews.title: really easily with a tissue
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to see if I can use this as face paint...instead of buying face paint. I got Alabama. The color matches the image in the product page, but only in very well light places, otherwise it's quite dark. I applied some to my hand and gave it an hour before attempting to take it off. It wiped off...really easily with a tissue. Just one swipe and the first layer was off. You'll probably need to reapply often throughout the day if you're looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, movie like color
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, dramatic color. I like bold lipsticks because they give a romantic Aura to the face. This color looks blackberry color on lips. It's a bit messy so apply it slowly, never on public transportation like me haha. Once applied carefully, it looks professional quality. Doesn't moisturize. That's not the point anyway. Thanks to seller and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Sa.

customer_reviews.title: Slight inconvenience
customer_reviews.text: Color is bold and just what I was looking for, my dislike about the product is when I push down to color my lip the lipstick will retract itself, so you really have to hold the lipstick a certain way so it stays up while you press it on, it's pretty inconvenient but for the price and color I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick g

customer_reviews.title: Department Store quality with a drug store price!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with Nyx Matte Lipsticks! The feel is creamy and glides on effortlessly. It isn't drying the way most matte lipsticks tend to be. The color is highly pigmented and pops on my lips. I am slowly working my way into every shade in this collection. So far, my absolute favorites are Alabama (rich red) and Violet. For reference, I have light hair, green eyes and fair skin. And have always worn nude type shades on my lips. I wanted to try something new and found Nyx Lip products to be very user friendly. I never thought I could wear colors so bold before, but Nyx made me fall in love with color for my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a real nyx product
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a real nyx product .. its stains my lips so bad .. i always buy myx lipsticks bc i love them never bought off amazon but i did this one time and its not even the real nyx produits says nyx but its not i literally have to take alcohol to wipe it off my lips bc thats how bad it stains
customer_reviews.author: Monica davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: I love having a variety of lipstick colors available. In an effort not to break the bank, I have looked around for bargain dupes that are of decent quality. I tried e.l.f. lipstick and was disappointed. I came across an article listing that recommended NYX Matte Lipstick so I decided to give it a try. I LOVE this lipstick. The color is great, it goes on smoothly and has staying power without drying out your lips. The color has a richly pigmented matte look and you can add gloss over the top if you want some shine. I'm a believer and plan to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: iheartprime

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't glide on
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get a bright red lipstick, sadly this one was a disappointment. It is a bit hard so the color doesn't glide on easily, I have tried using a lip pencil to put it on and that has made it better. The color does last a really long time (6 hours or so).
customer_reviews.author: Solei G.

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to the dark purple I desired .It’s more light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lipstick because I wanted a deep dark purple .This color is so light that it don’t even compare to the purple I desired .Now what’s crazy is the color looks really dark purple that’s the crazy part .I guess I’ll stick to buying my makeup at the stores because I hated when I could get my money worth from this product
customer_reviews.author: Kushondra D Willis

customer_reviews.title: they do bleed off lips
customer_reviews.text: I like the matte texture and the colors if you get the correct one. A lot of sites online with the colors listed and shown. But as some say it is true they bleed! I think you definitely need to wear a lip liner or some sort of powder, something to prime the lipstick or it runs off lips which is odd.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: It’s the finishing touch before going out the door. 😘
customer_reviews.text: I tried this today and it lasted until after lunchtime. The feel of the lipstick going on always gets me. It’s that final touch that says “I’m ready for the day !” I love the color, for me, it’s the perfect shade of red. As my mother used to tell me, “a bit of lipstick puts a smile on your day !” This does just that.💋
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color in photo not at all close to what ships
customer_reviews.text: The color that is shipped is much darker and for totally different skin tone than the color in the photo. And shipping to return it costs almost as much as the item itself so I guess I'll just throw the money right in the garbage next time to save me the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had put the top on with the lipstick in the up position after I had used it, but the lipstick continued to be in the up position after every use in spite of my lowering the lipstick so that it would not hit the cap and retain its shape. Since I used the lipstick and initially thinking I had not lowered the lipstick after use, I did not return it. Check it before use. Other than that, the lipstick was great.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I bought four colors and will never regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four colors and will never regret it. It stays on for a long time doesn’t wipe off as easy as most lipsticks and it’s very flattering. I think of it as a moisturizer as well from my lips are so soft when I put this on and when I remove it treat yourself to a great lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: loolielooloo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for this shade or the texture of the lipstick. Maybe it was the heat the did it but it was sticky feeling on my lips. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Weird Color
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I fell in love with the pictures of the lipstick and the color, it was just perfect! I was so excited to receive the lipstick, but my expectations were unfortunately not met whatsoever. There was nothing wrong with the shade of the lipstick itself when I received it, but when I applied it, it was like applying pink highlighter to my lips! The shade was way more pigmented than expected and was really hard to apply. It was splotchy but it did last a couple of hours. It wasnt very matte, but i guess it did have the dryhing affect. A little goes a long way so keep in mind when applying it to your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Loved this. I live in Nicaragua and the heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. I live in Nicaragua and the heat kind of melted a little bit the lipstick but its okay. The color is georgeos and what I expected. Not as matte as i wish but its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Q

customer_reviews.title: Same as Charlotte Tilbury "Pillow Talk"
customer_reviews.text: The color Euro Trash is almost identical to the way more expensive brand Charlotte Tilbury's lipstick Pillow Talk. The NYX formula is a little different and i prefer using a small brush to even it out on my lips, but both brands are cruelty free so it's nice to have a cheap back up of my favorite lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful color and is actually a little bit darker than pictures show. I only put it on long enough to just see the color so it's messy and I don't know much about the longevity of it but I highly suggest putting lip balm on beforehand since it makes your lips look a little dry
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love the Brand, Love the Lippie
customer_reviews.text: This color goes on really dark and vampy but fades evenly to a beautiful, surprisingly bright plum-purple. It has INCREDIBLE staying power (it only fades on me if I eat, and even then only slightly/evenly), it isn’t as drying as many matte lipsticks, and you can’t beat the price. NYX is the best!
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Best matte lipstick find this year! Exquisite texture
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage of this. It is creamy and emollient without being oilly. I wear coverage brands chanel and mac and this is now on that list. Very exquisite. Am buying more of their mattes and I'm throwing in their - Simply nude and creamy lipstick. Best find this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Parent

customer_reviews.title: Absolute BEST Lipstick for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lipstick for many years but it is getting hard to find in the stores. So happy I found it on amazon. I purchased two but I'm thinking of buying even more just in case they quick making this color. It's the perfect color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick was supposed to be a dupe for Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk - it's really not. It's a matte lipstick and seemed thick. It doesn't leave my lips looking smooth. I found it was not flattering and the color was coming off onto my teeth. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: SMCT

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love NYX lipsticks definitely don't look at the colors they show it the color is darker than what they show thank God I went to Ulta and verify the colors because had I not done that I would have been super pissed because the color is much darker than what you would think butter is it's more of a tan color but overall great coverage good product good for the money just double-check what color you're buying for the price because some of the products prices are different and cost more on here than what you could get it at ulta or a Vietnamese Beauty Supply
customer_reviews.author: Raveboobookittychic

customer_reviews.title: Good lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the moisturizer, and how smooth it goes on. I hate that it is kinda like regular lipstick not matte at all. If your lips touch anything it comes off BUT I guess thats good and bad. You don have to work hard to get it off but it also doesn’t stay lol. However, the color is popping
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: You’ll want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.text: These matte lipsticks are great! As good as some name brand matte lip products but much cheaper! At this price you can afford one of every color! Especially this “perfect red” is flattering on everyone! Just beautiful and these stay on all day looking great without needing to reapply- maybe touch up if you eat something greasy but otherwise flawless! Removed easily with micellar water.
customer_reviews.author: ori

customer_reviews.title: NYX Matte Likpstick - Merlot -- I took a chancce!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this shade and am not hardly disappointed. I'm amazed at the staying power of these NYX lipsticks. I was afraid the color would be very dark. It's perfect, it's creamy on the lips, it stays smooth on the lips, and most importantly for me, it does not come off on my teeth. I also ordered the shade "spiced tea" which is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, even though it's more pink than I expected- and I don't pull off pink very well. With that being said, this is the first time I tried a matte lipstick, usually I go with a satin. It won't stay all day- which is fine with me because most tend to dry out my lips. Decent lipstick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Daiquiri Should be Named Coho Salmon
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly named color. Strawberry daiquiri implies pinks and reds, not Coho Salmon. It’s a bright orange on my skin. I normally like orange tones on my skin but it was a lot of color, even after blotting.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: As a broke Uni student, I approve.
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on Aria for so long I just had to get it with my most recent order. Honestly, I love it! I'm dark skinned (I use black opal Black Walnut and Carob foundation) and it looks gorgeous against my skin. Plus applying it was a dream and it lasted for hours. And such good quality for this price too?! As a broke Uni student, I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Thinking outside the box and having fun.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Very impressed with this lipstick and shade. What a fun color, I’ve gotten wonderful compliments. I’ve had it on through Lunch, dinner and three cups of coffee and it still looks great. I’m extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: May Angela

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Color
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find it at Ulta so I came to Amazon. It’s my favorite NYX color. Who knew purple could be so awesome? You can add just a little for a light, kissable tint or pack it on for different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried it
customer_reviews.text: Great lipstick! Up the Bass is so pretty. Goes on smoothly, soft feel, not super sticky, good price! I do think the color is a little more pink than the picture. The picture to me was like a purple/gray but if I go back over my bottom lip and smudge my lips together I think it’s Very close to picture. I think I’ll be purchasing more 😃
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Not the best drugstore lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This formula didn't do anything for me. When I apply the lipstick, regardless of whether I exfoliate my lips, I get a weird problem where the lipstick just refuses to stick to my lips and looks really gross and patchy. I wouldn't repurchase this, and if I had purchased it in a store I would have returned it. There are better lipsticks for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Gloss is amazing, lipstick is just ok
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and wanted to love the product but after using MAC lipstick forever, this was just ok. I ordered this along with gloss from the same brand and loved the gloss. Just felt the lipstick could have gone on smoother and lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Adventuresinmomlife_

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color; Haze 🖤😘
customer_reviews.text: Bought in color "Haze". Loved the color, very flattering if you're into darks or gothic. Very silky as it goes on but dries quicky & doesn't stay on too long (especially if eating/drinking), have to reapply. But from what I understand the brand is Vegan & that's a win. Great price, would buy again 🖤
customer_reviews.author: Kat Eva

customer_reviews.title: Stunning color!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a super red lipstick with great quality and affordable and this is the great combination! For me the only problem was trying to remove the lipstick, even with make up remover and washing with cleansing I found to be hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Liziane

customer_reviews.title: More of a coral color
customer_reviews.text: This color arrived with a little brighter coral color than I expected but I will still use it. Believe it or not this is my first lipstick and it seemed a bit dry to me. It did last for most of the day and definitely brightened up my pale lips.
customer_reviews.author: TripleR

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: this is officially my FAVORITE lippie. Its a true nude for this woman of color. No red or ashy undertones. A true brown, that covers lip pigmentation well, but still looks natural and chic. Perfect for a bold eye. Doesnt even need a lip pencil to tweak the color. Gonna get more. ignore the picture. is a milk chocolate, matte brown. I like how its subtle enough that it looks like my natural lip color. there is a better representation of the actual color on the NYX website. #NYX fan
customer_reviews.author: glc

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: The color doesn’t really match the color shown at all. Mine is more of a purple as the one in the picture has more of a red tone. Kind of disappointed honestly. I guess it’s okay since it wasn’t expensive but still.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carr

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: I have about 20 tubes of NYX matte lipstick in Strawberry Daiquiri because I think they are discontinuing it. I hate that. I love NYX's matte lipstick because it doesn't dry out my lips, doesn't crumble off and keeps my lips moist. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyferguson

customer_reviews.title: This might be my favorite lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Wow you guys, this one is soooo great! I absolutely love this matte lipstick in this color. I will definitely be ordering more colors! It is very moisturizing, and stays on for quite some time! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaLee

customer_reviews.title: The Pale Pink is not pale
customer_reviews.text: I got the Pale Pink, and it's not what I was looking for. I wanted a light pink, and this color is more of a rich peachy pink. I kept it any way because it's still a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think...Just get it...
customer_reviews.text: For the first lipstick I've ever owned or worn, I really can't believe how easy it was to wear and match with different looks. The color was very flattering to my skin tone which can be difficult at times to match colors for as I'm very pale...like pale...the Irish heritage in me is very apparent. Lol The only slight complaint I would have is that even when dry it does transfer a bit and over about five hours it's time to reapply. So maybe use a lip gloss or carry it with, just be prepared. But overall definitely one of my go to brands and colors.
customer_reviews.author: ReaperGirl

customer_reviews.title: "Perfect Red" is perfection!
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick I bought on Amazon didn't make it to my house unfortunately, but I didn't give up, I went and bought one from Ulta. I'm a big collector of red lipsticks, from neutral to blue to pink to brown and orange undertones. I of course have my favorites and this is one of them. It should count that I'm also a fan of NYX - when it comes to quality/price, they're unbeatable. This one is a neutral red, I'd say pin-up style....so awesome. Everybody should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Dascenzo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for inexpensive makeup!!
customer_reviews.text: I am astonished at how well this $2 shade worked well on my lips! Wouldn't necessarily say this particular lipstick is mosturizing but it doesn't excessively dry out my skin like most cheap lipsticks might. Be sure to set your makeup well because the color is quick to come off! Overall, this color complements my skin well & I plan on buying this product again 🤩
customer_reviews.author: nzeli

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best lipsticks I’ve ever used! I’ve never even heard of this brand before (not really a makeup connoisseur) until I saw a review online. This shade compliments fair, cool toned complexions. This lipstick lasts a while and isn’t too dry or greasy. Very happy with this purchase and hope this color sticks around.
customer_reviews.author: abg02224

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: It's no doubt about it I love NYX and might be a bit biased but I honestly love the color so much. I thought that because I am a in between light and medium skin tone that maybe the color would not look good, but I was wrong, it looked absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: The stick in lipstick isn’t applicable... it breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2, both broke within 3 applications. I loved the color, but I can’t scoop broken lipstick . Also, the wear is a bit like toy lipstick - uneven color and drying
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great color, feels nice on lips. Looks great on. But, I don't feel like its really matte. its more like a less moist regular lipstick, or like their soft cream lipglosses. and has a lifespan of a normal lipstick. not that much staying power. will come off on food, utensil, paper, hand, etc. I have to bring it with me in case i eat or drink anything or smudge it. i just really like the color
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Once shade is mixed the color is flattering depending on your complexion. Was too pink at first. My complexion is medium dark so I mixed it with a darker lipstick for an ombre effect
customer_reviews.author: StephIAm

customer_reviews.title: NOT the color I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the color I ordered. SO annoyed. Not sure if I want to even try another color but this was NOT what I was expecting. I saw a reviewer that had this shade and I loved it. She must have gotten the correct color. I didn't. ugh.. Guess the colors you order are NOT what you always get.Should have listened to one review I saw.
customer_reviews.author: NatJH

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole line of NYX lipsticks. They glide on my lips and they stay on. I have several colors and this latest one, Eurotrash, is lovely. On my fair skin, it looks like a nice pinkish brown shade. I think it would look great on any skin tone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: For a low cost lipstick you get a bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: To compare this to lipsticks costing between 5 and 8 times as much, would be absurd. But for what you pay you get a lovely look that lasts reasonably well
customer_reviews.author: auntsuzy

customer_reviews.title: I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lipstick in Strawberry Daiquiri. I did my research and read the reviews and looked at multiple swatches on pinterest before I bought it. I knew it would be a lot darker than the Amazon picture showed. I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great color, not so great on long-term wear
customer_reviews.text: The color in the picture is definitely misleading. However, I knew that this wasn't the correct color because I saw a model with it on and the article said that this was the shade she was wearing. I love the color. But, it doesn't stay on well at all. I've tried putting it on and waiting for an hour or so before I drink or eat anything and it still comes right off. So, it's great for picture-taking but if you plan to wear it throughout the day, keep it with you so you can reapply. One other positive about it: It doesn't clump like other lipsticks I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly probably my favorite brand of lipstick. This color is amazing!!!!!! I want every single color in this particular lipstick! PLEASE GET YOURSELF ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Lipstacular!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them!! Great value for money and they look great. I’ve received many compliments on these lipsticks. My go-to shade is Euro trash. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Matte Lipstick - Perfect Red, Bright Blue-Toned Red
product_meta.description: Color:Perfect RedNYX matte lipsticks are highly pigmented, richly formulated lipsticks that glide on smoothly, stay put and impart a non-glossy, high-fashion matte finish as they envelop lips in brilliant color. From pure red to nude, matte lipstick is available in 22 rich, shades.
feature_bullets: SMOOTH & PLUSH MATTE LIPSTICK: Load your lips with the plush, pigment-rich matte colors of this shockingly smooth matte lipstick that glides right on and stays in place with a silky matte finish.

CREAMY & DREAMY: This matte lipstick is never dry feeling, always creamy, dreamy and matte! Now available in a range of fresh new matte colors, these playful matte lipstick shades are just what your lips need!
LIP PRODUCTS FOR THE PERFECT POUT: Doll your lips in plush, creamy, perfection! Try our complete line of lip products including lipstick, lip liner, lip gloss, lip cream, lip liner & butter gloss.

CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more!
